Title: Relates to repealing the driver's license access and privacy act
Summary: Repeals the driver's license access and privacy act.
LawCode: Rpld §201 subs 8 - 12, §502 subs 1, 7 & 8, amd §§502 & 508, V & T L; rpld §7, Chap 37 of 2019
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to repealing the driver's license access and privacy act; to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto; to repeal section 7 of chapter 39 of the laws of 2019, amending the vehicle and traffic law relating to the issuance of non-commercial drivers' licenses and learners' permits; and to repeal subdivision 1 of section 502 of the vehicle and traffic law
